procedure.title: Installing &abbrev; with user-interaction
procedure.para: The &abbrev; application can be installed in an interactive way.

step.para: Unpack the package with the following command:

Answer the questions with y or n. Besides these, the following commands are available: ? displays the help, q exits the installer. The installer generates a default configuration file for &abbrev; based on the answers (if an old configuration file is not used):

listitem.para: the path of the license file
whether an old configuration file is to be used (if the answer is yes, the rest of the questions will be skipped)
if a new configuration file is requested, whether &abbrev; will send or receive logs over the network

step.para: The installer finishes the installation and the replaces the default syslog service with &abbrev;.
